content.text: 0) Melt chocolate and cream in double boiler over low heat, stirring constantly.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "chocolate"@8:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "cream"@22:27 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "double boiler"@31:44 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "low heat"@50:58 / TEMPERATURE )
		:simultaneous ( ac-0-1 "stirring"@60:68 / AC )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Dip pretzels one at a time quickly to coat while mixture is still very warm.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Dip"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "pretzels"@7:15 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-1-0 "to coat while mixture is still very warm"@38:78 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place pretzels on wax paper to set and cool.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "pretzels"@9:17 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "wax paper"@21:30 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-2-0 "to set and cool"@31:46 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
